title: Android 11 media controls and long song title
content:
Pixel/Android 11

Scenario: playing a song on Spotify with a long title "Cradle (Better Nature)"

On lock screen: song title cut down to "Cradle (Better N..." do to space constraints

I swipe down on the media controls - it jumps to the notification shade and now the title is cut to "Cradle (Bett..."

I swipe down on media controls from notification shade and it now brings down the shade and shows the full title "Cradle (Better Nature)"

In Android 10, it took only one swipe to see the full title; in Android 11, it takes two

It's particularly frustrating when discovering new music on Spotify when I want to find out the full title

Potential solution: Make long titles operate like text tickers?
